name: Quest To Find All
description:
Using the theme Foofaraw, The Great Hero, travels through his vast, amazing town, to discover the secret the lies there. 5 Unique locations, achievements to hunt and gather, and all you have to do is play this game.

Arrow Keys for navigation.

Z key to interact with environment.

X key to interact with environment.

Tab key to warp back to main town in case you get stuck.
